item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

                    if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("empty") && c.playerRights == 0) {
                            if(!c.inWild()) {
                                    c.getPA().removeAllItems();
                            } else {
                                    c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command in the wilderness!");
                            }
                    }
